summary: Blocking: marker still points to da31504 and references plan/progress files that no longer exist, and the most recent plan/progress update kept placeholder text instead of a real summary.

issues.root_cause: make turn_end was not rerun after commits 7ecdce1 through 3492a0f, so the marker was left on the earlier commit da31504.
issues.mitigation: Run make turn_end m="summary" (or equivalent) now so docs/self-improvement/markers/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.json captures HEAD 3492a0f and the current notebook state.
issues.prevention: Add an explicit checklist step to refresh the marker immediately after recording audits or deleting notebooks so the head and notebook metadata stay aligned.
issues.evidence: docs/self-improvement/markers/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.json still reports head da31504cd9a550d4â€¦ while git rev-parse feature/sa-review-subagent-guardrail returns 3492a0fe8d8b224ec440915ff79128d35e78c931, and docs/plans/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md is absent from HEAD.

issues.root_cause: The branch notebooks were committed with template placeholders and removed before the summary/artifact fields were ever filled in.
issues.mitigation: Recreate docs/plans/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md and docs/progress/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md with the 2025-11-02 17:06 content completed (real summary, artifacts, next actions) before recommitting.
issues.prevention: Before committing plan/progress updates, confirm all template placeholders are replaced with concrete information or add an automated check that fails when placeholders remain.
issues.evidence: git show 7ecdce19412a6aef0b1a93d2ea25297b1676ce77:docs/progress/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md shows the 2025-11-02 17:06:27 entry containing 'Summary - summary' and 'Artifacts - TODO', and the paired docs/plans/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md ends with '- [ ] summary'.

follow_ups: Run make turn_end m="summary" (or an equivalent helper) so the marker reflects HEAD 3492a0f and the current notebook paths.

Restore docs/plans/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md and docs/progress/feature-sa-review-subagent-guardrail.md with completed 2025-11-02 17:06 entries, replacing the placeholder text before committing.
